name: Derelict Monorail
description: Nara Dreamland amusement park, Japan (now demolished).  There had been a lot of rumours circulating about how hard this was to access, though up to this point we'd found most locations wide open and easily accessible, so we decided to do a drive-by the night before our planned dawn entry.  As we drove down an overgrown track which circled the theme park, a loud recording in Japanese sounded from out of nowhere, which turned out to be a random speaker installed beside the road, presumably to warn off people contemplating trespassing.  Unperturbed, we merrily waltzed in through an open gate just before dawn and were stunned to spot a security car parked just inside the gates, awaiting entering trespassers.  He must have been snoozing, so we very quietly reversed and entered via some less convenient thick scrub.
